Package com.github.actionfx.core.bind

Class AbstractCachingBindingTargetResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.bind.AbstractCachingBindingTargetResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindingTargetResolver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NameBasedBindindTargetResolver
    public abstract class AbstractCachingBindingTargetResolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements BindingTargetResolver
    Abstract base class of a BindingTargetResolver implementation that supports an internal caching.
    Author:
    koster

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolve​(java.lang.Object bean, View view)
      Resolves the given bean and view to a list of BindingTarget describing the relation between controls inside the view and a field value inside a bean hierarchy.
      protected java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolveInternal​(java.lang.Object bean, View view)
      Resolve the actual binding targets by checking all controls in the given view, whether these are candidates for a binding.
      protected abstract java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolveInternal​(javafx.scene.control.Control control, java.lang.Object bean, View view)
      Method to be overridden to resolve the actual binding targets.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        public java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolve​(java.lang.Object bean,
                                             View view)
        Description copied from interface: BindingTargetResolver
        Resolves the given bean and view to a list of BindingTarget describing the relation between controls inside the view and a field value inside a bean hierarchy.
        Specified by:
        resolve in interface BindingTargetResolver
        Parameters:
        bean - the root bean instance holding values to bind to controls
        view - the view holing controls
        Returns:
        the resolved BindingTargets

      • resolveInternal

        protected java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolveInternal​(java.lang.Object bean,
                                                        View view)
        Resolve the actual binding targets by checking all controls in the given view, whether these are candidates for a binding.
        Parameters:
        bean - the root bean instance holding values to bind to controls
        view - the view holing controls
        Returns:
        the resolved BindingTargets

      • resolveInternal

        protected abstract java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolveInternal​(javafx.scene.control.Control control,
                                                                 java.lang.Object bean,
                                                                 View view)
        Method to be overridden to resolve the actual binding targets. Please note that one control can result in multiple binding targets (different properties of one control can be bound). Thus, this method returns a list of binding targets.
        Parameters:
        control - the control that is potential binding target
        bean - the root bean instance holding values to bind to controls
        view - the view holing controls
        Returns:
        the resolved BindingTargets, or an empty list, if resolution is not possible.
